last_episode_to_air.name: Who's Afraid of the Big Bad Wolf?
last_episode_to_air.overview: Logan finds evidence to get Wolf out of jail; Wolf makes a stunning discovery.

name: Scoundrels
overview: A family of small-time criminals try to go straight after the father is sent to prison.
tagline: A family with slightly different values.

episodes.name: And Jill Came Tumbling After
episodes.overview: The patriarch of a family of small-town criminals is sentenced to a lengthy prison term, leaving the mother to care for the criminal brood; to keep her kids out of trouble, the woman wants her family to go straight.

episodes.name: Mary, Mary, Quite Contrary
episodes.overview: Cheryl, Heather and Cal get jobs as they try to embrace a crime-free lifestyle; Cal finds out his new job as a pool boy has unexpected requirements.

episodes.name: Liar, Liar, Pants on Fire
episodes.overview: A threat forces Logan to show his true West family colors; a local strip club hires Heather.

episodes.name: Where Have You Been, Charming Billy?
episodes.overview: Billy dies from being stupid. Wolf comes home for the funeral and takes full advantage of the situation. Cal is suffering big time due to the loss of Billy. Logan and Cal do not see eye to eye.

episodes.name: Yes, Sir, Yes, Sir, Three Bags Full
episodes.overview: In the midst of a serious financial crisis, the Wests realize they must find legitimate jobs as soon as possible.

episodes.name: Birds of a Feather Flock Together
episodes.overview: Cheryl starts her job at the insurance company but everything may not be on the up and up. Speculation surrounds Cal and Logan now that Mrs. Hong is pregnant.

episodes.name: That's the Way the Money Goes
episodes.overview: Cheryl's new business is on the brink of failure; Logan acts on his feelings for Patty; Heather falls in love.

episodes.name: Who's Afraid of the Big Bad Wolf?
episodes.overview: Logan finds evidence to get Wolf out of jail; Wolf makes a stunning discovery.
